short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate XMLs more efficiently and view them in style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navigate XMLs more efficiently and view them in style!

Features:
View XMLs in 3 themes: Classic, Dark, and Light.
Collapse or expand nodes with simple commands.

To Collapse Child Nodes:
CTRL+LEFT_CLICK on a node.

To Expand Child Nodes:
ALT+LEFT_CLICK on a node.

To Colapse Sibling Nodes:
CTRL+DOUBLE_LEFT_CLICK on a node.

To Expand Sibling Nodes:
ALT+DOUBLE_RIGHT_CLICK on a node.

** Note **
If you wish to use this extension for local files, make sure enable access to file URLs in extension settings:
1) Navigate to chrome://extensions
2) Click on details of FleXML extension
3) Toggle "Allow access to file URLs" setting to ON
